ace_zero.sensor module¶

Sensor Model

class ace_zero.sensor.Sensor(name='Sensor', max_range=19500.0, fov=30.0, s_x=0.0, s_y=0.0, s_z=0.0, s_psi=0.0, s_theta=0.0, s_phi=0.0, **kwargs)[source]¶

A model of a sensor.
